subject: World Cup 2010 (Soccer)
Soccer
lead_paragraph: The Americans were ousted by a Ghana team that had a playmaker at the right time. The U.S. needs someone like that. As Bryant said, “All it takes is one.”
snippet: The Americans were ousted by a Ghana team that had a playmaker at the right time. The U.S. needs someone like that. As Bryant said, “All it takes is one.”
